title: Calories in Chicken Broccoli Chinese
meta_description: Discover calories in chicken broccoli chinese dish per serving, including protein, carbs, fat, sodium details, and easy tweaks for your takeout favorite.
assumptions: Stir-fried boneless chicken breast with broccoli florets in a light soy-ginger sauce; standard Chinese restaurant style, no added rice.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, sauce thickness, oil used, and ingredients; check menus or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: 250 g of chicken broccoli Chinese provides ~275 kcal and ~30 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp extra oyster sauce per 100 g
Use tofu instead of chicken per 100 g
Steam instead of stir-fry (less oil) per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of chicken broccoli chinese?
faqs.a: About 275 kcal for a 250 g serving.

faqs.q: Is chicken broccoli chinese high in protein?
faqs.a: Yes, ~30 g protein per 250 g serving from the chicken.

faqs.q: What's the sodium content in chicken broccoli chinese?
faqs.a: Around 1125 mg per 250 g due to soy sauce; watch if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Are there many carbs in chicken broccoli chinese?
faqs.a: Lowâ€”about 12.5 g carbs per 250 g, mostly from veggies and sauce.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in chicken broccoli chinese?
faqs.a: Opt for steamed preparation, less oil, or more broccoli and less sauce.
